attributes.action: Change the national antem to 'U can't touch this'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We wish to replace the current national anthem with 'U can't this' by MC hammer as i feel this musical masterpiece best represents the British Public. I also feel that laws must be passed to ensure that everyone in the country owns a pair of parachute pants.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
